text: Samuel Joseph Austin (born 19 December 1996) is a footballer who plays as a winger for Kidderminster Harriers in the National League North. ==Career== Austin made his debut for Burton Albion in a 3–0 home loss to Brighton & Hove Albion on 24 September 2013 in the League Cup. He made his League Two debut on 25 October 2014 in a 1–0 away loss to Stevenage. On Friday 20 November 2015 Austin joined conference north side AFC Telford United on loan till January 2016. He was released by Burton Albion at the end of the 2015–16 season.
